Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Analysis of factors which affect power relations among nations, including area, location, political styles, ethnic divisions, and the politics of energy.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Analysis of basic principles and problems associated with development, use, conservation, and management of natural resources, with special emphasis on the United States.

Department.text: School of Politics, Security, and International Affairs

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Basic physical elements of geography, including climate, landforms, soils, natural vegetation, minerals, and their integrated patterns of world distribution.
